entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries near noon and 40 percent chance of rain showers late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
